rules_text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal damage to a player, put an ascension counter on this enchantment, scry 1, then exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Then if there are five or more ascension counters on this enchantment, put any number of land cards exiled with it onto the battlefield, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled with it without paying their costs.
